title: UAE drops corporate tax for sports bodies under new law: Here’s who qualifies
summary_full: The United Arab Emirates Ministry of Finance has introduced a new corporate tax exemption for non-commercial sports organisations. This policy aims to boost the UAE's sports sector and strengthen its global standing. Qualifying entities must be officially recognised and strictly non-commercial. The move is expected to encourage investment and growth within the sports ecosystem, supporting talent development and international partnerships.
